item.title: Barclays and the Notch
item.description: Barclays and the Notch The iPhone X with the notch was released in November 2017, that’s more than 5.5 years ago. Somehow Barclays hasn’t gotten the news yet ðŸ™„. The Barclays banking app doesn’t respect.
